column1: Trump pitched doing a shark tank like reality show to find a coronavirus cure.

Ok... by what I have been watching over the past month and amidst all of the distractions on twitter and in MSM.

We are all at the mercy of #CoronaVirus

Its weeks away from engulfing these islands.

I will be taking serious measures NOW!

All good people have my thoughts.
If you don't wash your hands before the coronavirus came out, you're nasty.
